name: Blade of Verdance - Demo
description:
Blade of Verdance is a 2D story-driven turn-based RPG featuring pixel art. The game is mostly inspired by JRPGs such as Persona (for its gameplay) and Final Fantasy Tactics (for its world and story). The game takes place in a original medieval fantasy world, with all the sword and sorcery it implies (no orcs/elves/dwarves though). The plot focuses on themes such as duty, power, politics and betrayal, and we hope to make it one of the strong points of the game.

Have fun!
